animations.xml: <storyboard event="open"><animation property="opacity" from="0" to="0" begin="" duration="" mode="Linear" /><animation property="opacity" from="0" to="1" begin="650" duration="1500" mode="Linear" /><animation property="offsetX" from="1" to="0" begin="650" duration="1500" mode="Linear" /></storyboard>

<storyboard event="open"><animation property="opacity" from="0" to="0" begin="" duration="" mode="Linear" /><animation property="scaleOrigin" to="0 0" begin="" duration="" mode="Linear" /><animation property="opacity" from="0" to="1" begin="1000" duration="7500" mode="Linear" /><animation property="scale" from="0" to="1" begin="650" duration="7500" mode="easeIn" /><animation property="h" from="$size_y" to="0.2" begin="2150" duration="500" mode="bump" /><animation property="h" from="0.2" to="$size_y" begin="2250" duration="500" mode="bump" /><animation property="w" from="$size_x" to="0.2" begin="2200" duration="500" mode="bump" /><animation property="w" from="0.2" to="$size_x" begin="2300" duration="500" mode="bump" /><animation property="w" from="$size_x" to="0.35" begin="2400" duration="500" mode="bump" /><animation property="w" from="0.35" to="$size_x" begin="2500" duration="500" mode="bump" /></storyboard>

<storyboard event="open" repeatAt="2550"><animation property="opacity" from="1" to="0" begin="0" duration="0" mode="linear" /><animation property="opacity" from="0" to="1" begin="500" duration="2000" mode="linear" /><animation property="opacity" from="1" to="0.8" begin="2800" duration="40" autoreverse="true" repeat="5" mode="linear" /><animation property="opacity" from="1" to="0.8" begin="3500" duration="5" autoreverse="true" repeat="3" mode="linear" /><animation property="opacity" from="1" to="0.8" begin="5500" duration="7" autoreverse="true" repeat="2" mode="linear" /><animation property="opacity" from="1" to="0.8" begin="6000" duration="5" autoreverse="true" repeat="4" mode="linear" /><animation property="opacity" from="1" to="0.8" begin="11000" duration="40" autoreverse="true" repeat="40" mode="linear" /></storyboard>
